attributes.title: Too communist for me
attributes.review: I wanted to be so happy and use this app about trump but honestly it has come to my attention that he is a communist. It is very very sad to see that he is a communist. Communism is just so bad and capitalism is just so good. Very VERY sad to see the extreme communism (which is very bad) expressed by Donald Trump and his team and of course this app. Hope he changes his ways and stops being communism :( 😢

attributes.title: Bruh...
attributes.review:
Homies,  
I would just like you all to know that app is not worth the space, not because It support the eraser and controlling nature of the current president but that’s it goes against the flag codes, aids a tyrannical government, discrimination against American people’s and information of the American people, and will also track and harbor your information against the 8th Amendment. Apple do better

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Downloaded the app and my phone immediately began targeting and attacking minorities for simply existing!! not only that but it also began targeting children and being EXTREMELY inappropriate. my phone began showing me white supremacist propaganda and THEN completely shut off. very upset with this app. definitely needs to be taken off the app store. anyways, black lives matter

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!
attributes.review: Did not have to get them on my phone so they don’t know how much it would probably do to get the car back!! Oh my gosh and I wasn’t able to make it to the house because this app repeatedly sent creepy little messages to my youngest daughter! Couldn’t even connect the GPS because of it! 10/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: Do not get this app!!
attributes.review: I’m very disappointed with this app! As soon as I downloaded the app my skin turned orange! If you wish not to look like a Cheeto I very much advice you NOT to download this app. This resulted in my husband leaving and taking the kids😩🥺😤😭🤬. I now live on the streets with my pet ant and raccoon. For your sake please don’t get this app. It has taken my husband, children, and dignity from me.

This app is so horrible. Not only did it give out my location to a random guy in Czech it paid for the guys ticket to my city. He then told me to meet him at Starbucks for coffee but then kidnapped me, and forced my family to pay 900k ransom!!! When they paid it he broke into the house, stole my laptop, my tv, my dog, my mama, my toenail clipper and even my sisters left ovary! Horrible app!! Do not buy!!!!

attributes.title: This app is the worst
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and when I opened it a warning popped up and said this could sense that I wasn’t  white. I was scared when it said if I don't leave the app immediately I wouldn’t be safe.....this app is the worst I wouldn’t want anyone to download this app🤬 the worst app on the world....if you want t

You and your family to be safe don’t download this app...

attributes.title: the worst app.
attributes.review: after i downloaded this app on my iphone 8, it started to glitch out like crazy. my phone would randomly shut off at times and then turn back on 20-40 minutes later. i wouldn’t get any of my notifications or calls. my phone finally had enough and then it just shut off completely. i’ve tried all of the ways i could find to turn it on, it just would not. which results in me buying a whole new phone, that might seem like a good deal but i didn’t plan on spending a thousand dollar on a new phone. this app is the true virus of 2020, not covid-19.

attributes.title: do NOT get this app😾😿🙀
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app a big orange oopma loompa popped up on my screen then my whole phone glitched. Awful. Straight up awful. It then had the AUDACITY to ask me for it to send me notifications. No❤️ My phone has been glitching ever since I got it so I had to delete it. It was also a waste of my space, time, and my data🙀😼this app should b cancelled~ bunker boy❤️

attributes.title: VERY BAD! TREMENDOUSLY TRASH!
attributes.review:
This app is very ugly. Bad. The worst. Nothing is worse than this app. The color scheme is atrocious, and it will screw up your device, and your very life! As soon as I downloaded this a meteor came crashing through my ceiling! Coincidence? I think not! This app is obviously CURSED as it brings misfortune to those unlucky enough to download it. This must be fixed immediately!!!! 

Anyway have a fantasmic evening🧚🧚🧚👁👄👁
